summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 5 mbar), light levels (up 5792 lux), and cloud levels (up 608 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1536 m), light levels (up 8050 lux), and rainfall (down 0.3 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 608.0m lower than yesterday, 1078.5m lower than past week, 1536.4m lower than past month.

The cloud levels measurements for yesterday ranged from 860m to 3110m and averaged 1265.3m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels. Possible light showers, the clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Changeable conditions.
